basics.name: Henry Ashton-Martyn
basics.label: Senior Test Analyst
basics.summary: I'm a tester, developer, and test automater. I love the challegnges that each of these provide but I'm particularly passionate about test automation and test tooling. My side projects include web development, http://www.isthisacat.xyz/ and http://www.whatdayisitin.nz/, stock market simulation, and stock picking tools. I've taken part in the Software Testing World Cup, Startup Weekend Christchurch, and spoken at a combined Agile Proffessionals Network and Test Proffessionals Network event.

highlights: Proposed and had accepted a Callaghan student project for a new build system for the Terminals team
Championed BDD adoption
Member of the Test Management group
Ran Python training courses
Spoke about my experiences in test automation at a combined Agile Professionals Netowrk and Test Professionals Network event
Recently started in a development role on a new project
Proposed and had accepted a Callaghan student project for test data analysis with Kibana
Attended the Agile Testing Days conference in Germany
Sole tester on the Terminals P25 Trunking Phase 2 project
Implemented a performance testing framework
Manager and maintainer of the test automation backlog
Responsible for the architecture of the test automation software and supporting libraries
Reviewing test case design and implementation from colleagues
Monitoring the stability of the tests and ensuring that trends in stability are visible
SQL database maintenance
Developing and deploying bug fixes and features to e-commerce web sites
Developing bug fixes at a platform level
Developing suites of unit tests for core platform libraries
Attended the OWASP (Open Web Application Security Project) NZ Day 2013 in Auckland
Maintaining a Jenkins Continuous Integration Server
Mentoring team members in their automation development work
Teaching team members how to analyse automated test results
Technical leader in test automation
Automated test results analysis and publication
Manual testing and results publication
Verification of bug fixes for developers
Development of test tools

awards.title: 1st place in the Software Testing World Cup Oceania heats
2nd place in the Software Testing World Cup final
